title: Vegan apple oatmeal pancakes
ingredients: ['120g wholemeal flour', '10 tablespoons porridge oats', '5 tablespoons raw sugar', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'egg substitute equal to 1 egg', '5 tablespoons margarine, melted', '250ml soya milk', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 medium apples']
